de.unistuttgart.vis.wearable.os.sensors

Class InternalSensors

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.unistuttgart.vis.wearable.os.sensors.InternalSensors
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.hardware.SensorEventListener

    public class InternalSensors
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.hardware.SensorEventListener
    Links the android.hardware.Sensors to Sensor objects. Saves the incomeing values to the corresponding Sensor Object.
    Author:
    pfaehlfd

    • Constructor Detail

      • InternalSensors

        public InternalSensors(android.content.Context context)
        Creates and saves the instance of InternalSensors. Loads the internal sensors from the storage, creates the new supported internal sensors and saves them to the SensorManagers sensor list.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static InternalSensors getInstance()
        returns the instance of InternalSensors. The constructor must be called one time before getInstance. Otherwise this method will throw a UnsupportedOperationException.

      • enableInternalSensor

        protected void enableInternalSensor(Sensor sensor)
        Enables the given internal sensor. => sets enabled true and registers the according listener.

      • disableInternalSensor

        public void disableInternalSensor(Sensor sensor)
        Disables the given internal sensor. => sets enabled false and unregisters the according listener.

      • onSensorChanged

        public void onSensorChanged(android.hardware.SensorEvent sensorEvent)
        saves the incoming sensor values to the according sensor object.
        Specified by:
        onSensorChanged in interface android.hardware.SensorEventListener

        public void onAccuracyChanged(android.hardware.Sensor sensor,
                              int i)
        Specified by:
